forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High near 5C. Winds ENE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun. High 43F. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low -6C. Winds ENE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 23F. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High 7C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High 48F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear early, then a few clouds later on. Low -7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 21F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. High 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High around 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low -4C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 26F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High around 10C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny, along with a few afternoon clouds. High 53F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear. Low -2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear. Low 31F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 11C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 53F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain with some snow mixing in late. Low 2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain with some snow mixing in late. Low 38F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the morning changing to rain late. High 9C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High near 50F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow in the evening, becoming all snow late. Low 3C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of precip 80%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 39F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of snow. High 3C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of snow 70%. 7-12cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow. High 41F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. About one inch of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers. Low -7C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional snow showers. Low 22F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. About one inch of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers. High 3C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional snow showers. High 39F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low -9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 7-12cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional snow showers. Low 19F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. 3 to 5 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers. High 3C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. 7-12cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Variable clouds with snow showers. High 39F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 3 to 5 inches.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional snow showers. Low around -5C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low around 25F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variably cloudy with snow showers. High 4C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional snow showers mixing with rain in the afternoon. High 42F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers. Low -2C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low 31F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.
